page.title: 12RELIGION - PRESBYTERIAN
page.content:
We interviewed the minister of the Church of Scotland in Dyce and he gave us the following information.
There are{1918 members}in his congregation and he has had 20 young members joining his church in the last year. The majority are women and most of the members come from Dyce. There has been an increase in church attendance over the past year.
Organisations attached to the church include the Boys Brigade and the Girl Guides.
There have been{32 weddings in the {past year and not all who got married {were church members.}Thirty-nine babies have been christened in the last year.
